metadata.dc:title: Subset of fossil records from Pirro Nord 13
metadata.dc:creator: Domenico Giusti
metadata.dc:subject: Pirro Nord 13
Spatial database
Taphonomy
metadata.dc:description: Subset of fossil records (macrovertebrate remains) from the Early Pleistocene site of Pirro Nord 13. The dataset provides taphononic (abrasion, oxidation, weatering, taphorecord) and spatial (x, y, z coordinates) information.
metadata.dc:source: Bagnus, C., 2011. Analisi tafonomica delle associazione a vertebrati del Pleistocene Inferiore di Pirro Nord. Università degli Studi di Torino, Italy (Ph.D. thesis)
